sentences.en: What the parishioner lost was enormous.
sentences.cn: 教区居民的损失是巨大的。

sentences.en: I'll discover the parish of that parishioner.
sentences.cn: 我会找到这个教民所属的教区。

sentences.en: It was not so very long ago that I was a parishioner of the parish of die-of-hunger-if-you-have-a-fire, -die-of-cold-if-you-have-bread!
sentences.cn: 时间不短了，我老在这个‘不挨冻你就得挨饿不挨饿你就得挨冻’的教区里当一个教民！
